Kefir and its effects on breast cancer

  • In conclusion, kefir is effective in inhibiting proliferation and inducing apoptosis of HTLV-1-negative malignant T-lymphocytes. Therefore, further in vivo investigation is highly recommended.
    • Link to article
    • Cancer Management and Research. Published 2011.
  • There is a growing body of literature on the use of natural products for cancer prevention. To date, few trials have demonstrated conclusive benefit. Current guidelines recommend against the use of natural products for cancer prevention.
    • Link to article
    • Seminars in oncology nursing. Published February 2012.
